sentences: Piotr Rogucki (born 5 May 1978 in Łódź) is a Polish singer, musician, and actor, best known as the leader of rock band Coma.

He has released six studio albums with Coma:  Pierwsze wyjście z mroku (2004), Zaprzepaszczone siły wielkiej armii świętych znaków (2006), Hipertrofia (2008), Excess (2010), an untitled album commonly known as Czerwony album (2011) and Don't Set Your Dogs on Me (2013).
He has also released two solo studio albums, Loki – Wizja Dźwięku (2011) and 95–2003' (2012).
